reviews.review: Good game if you like to slaughter people.

it's ok. You'll run into alot of sweaty killers and single minded survivors, but the fun times you'll have with your teammates and friends will always make this game a fun time, and hopefully you won't regret your purchase

it is a very unique game, i play this on PC occasionally but i main on console (PS4) because i have a group of friends to play with there, but the PC version is far better. better loading times, better queues, access to the PTB, and ability to play with either controller or keyboard to name a few reasons i recommend the PC over console. this game is not perfect by any means it has a lot of bugs and i mean A LOT, not only that connections can be wonky at times. the hit boxes have always been give or take in most games meaning either you will get away without being hit when you should have or just get hit even though the killer was a good distance between you and him. camping can be annoying to deal with ( but that goes with most games i presume) however once you play for a bit you'll get access to perks to help combat camping but it can be a while before you get there. the developers seem to be doing a pretty consistent job of letting people know what they are doing and plan to do however they have been going pretty heavy on the premium currency cosmetics the past year. 
 
despite all that this game has me hooked i love playing as survivor and having intense chase moments with the killer, it becomes so rewarding once you start figuring out little tricks here and there that help improve your game play and eventually you get games where you pull off the most unlikely of scenarios and feel like a boss. this is by far my favorite game and i would recommend checking it out if ever given the chance.

çok güzel bir oyun ama sinir bozabiliyo bazen ama kesinlikle alın

Oyunu seviyor muyum sevmiyor muyum hiçbir fikrimin olmadığı tek oyun olabilir. Arkadaşım vesilesiyle almıştım onla oynarken gayet eğlenceliydi fakat tek başına ve oyun bilgin de azsa sürekli katile yakalanıp ölüyorsunuz <bir süre sonra çok tilt ediyor> ve quit atıyorsunuz. Bir süre oynamıyorsunuz ve anlık ya bi açayım da oynayayım diyip aynı şeyi yaşayıp tekrar quit atıyorsunuz. Böyle böyle 100 küsür saatim olmuş şu an can sıkıntısından stres atmak için girdiğim bir oyun oldu sadece. Oyunu sevmek ve iyi oynamak için ekstra sabır ve iyi takım arkadaşları gerekiyor... Oynayan arkadaşınız yoksa almayın bence hem öğrenmek hem oynamak sıkıcı oluyor fakat oynayan arkadaşlarınız varsa gerçekten birlikte güzel vakit geçirebileceğiniz bir oyun.

This game is fun with the right people. Expect a lot of camp tunnel and now slugging for survivors and annoying clicking, hiding, and t-bagging for Killers.  

It's rare to find fun games so find some cool people to kill with friends with or survive with.

Игру покупал ещё до Нового года,надеялся что разрабы над своим дейтищем работаю,исправят баги....А вот и нифига не изменилось,как была игра гавном так им и осталась,долгое ожидание игры за маньяка,графа слабая,писал им в тех поддержку так и не дождался исправлений.Зато получили платный контент вместо исправлений багов.Мой ответ разрабам Пошли нахх........Удаляю игру

还没1000小时入门的双边玩家。
作为屠夫：
1.求求人类大佬别秀了，玩不过玩不过，头皮发麻
2.车队见好就收好吧，其他不多说
3.手电筒真的烦，见一次剁手一次
4.遇到萌新和菜看心情，想放就放了。既然放了就别指了，安生走行吧
作为人类：
没啥说的，孤狼一只，该修修，该溜溜，该躺躺，该上树上树，不守就不拔。
总结：
1.没啥志向，人屠双佛系，甚至不想升段。
2.对于人屠关系紧张，也不想表达什么看法。
3.游戏是好游戏，BUG是好BUG，匹配机制就那样，不好不坏可以了，不要求那么多。Ps：唯一求设计师衣服搞好看点，领导圣诞叮叮响的衣服，我觉得还可以加特效，一路火花带闪电那种，炫酷
对萌新：
极其建议入手，没什么友好不友好的，什么游戏半路加进来在老玩家面前都有劣势，自己开心就行。技术流玩家更好说了，被砍了学技术溜回去；被溜了学套路砍回去，游戏本来就没那么复杂。
Когда бежишь от Маерса и Бубы то ощущаешь как твои трусы становятся мокрыми.
